thread.title: Rush Limbaugh: No Question Democrats Are Doing Everything They Can to ‘Sabotage’ Trump
thread.title_full: Rush Limbaugh: No Question Democrats Are Doing Everything They Can to ‘Sabotage’ Trump

author: Josh Feldman
title: Rush Limbaugh: No Question Democrats Are Doing Everything They Can to ‘Sabotage’ Trump
text:
Rush Limbaugh: No Question Democrats Are Doing Everything They Can to ‘Sabotage’ Trump by Josh Feldman | 9:58 am, February 19th, 2017 
Rush Limbaugh made a rare television appearance on Fox News Sunday today, and he told Chris Wallace that there is clearly a liberal effort to “sabotage” President Trump going on. 
“It is preposterous to believe,” he said, “that the Russians had any effect on the outcome of voting in this country.” 
Limbaugh said people need to better understand Trump and what his supporters like about him, not to mention the earnest belief many of them held that “they were gonna lose the country if Hillary Clinton won.” 
He discussed the idea of there being an Obama “shadow government” of people who are pushing leaks to damage the Trump administration, because of the Democratic party’s inability to win at the ballot box and their shrinking influence. 
“The left, which is run by Obama and Hillary and the hierarchy of the Democrat party,” Limbaugh said, “is doing everything they can to undermine, sabotage, and to prevent Trump from implementing his agenda. There’s no question about it.” 
Watch above, via Fox.
